meanings.definition: A person legally entitled to the property or rank of another upon that person's death.
meanings.sent1: The heirs received the old house when their grandfather passed away.
meanings.sent2: After her grandmother's passing, she became one of the heirs to the family fortune.
meanings.sent3: The heirs were surprised to find out they inherited a pet parrot along with the mansion.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the magical ring passed down to the heirs granted them special powers.
meanings.sent5: The heirs eagerly awaited the reading of the will to discover their inheritance.

meanings.definition: A person who inherits or has a right of inheritance in the property of another.
meanings.sent1: The heirs were happy to find out they would inherit the farm from their parents.
meanings.sent2: She was one of the heirs to the throne, waiting for her turn to rule the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The heirs joked about having to split the inheritance equally, including the quirky collection of hats.
meanings.sent4: The family heirloom passed down to the heirs symbolized their shared history and legacy.
meanings.sent5: The heirs were proud to carry on the family tradition of generosity and kindness.
